author: diguida
body:
This Pull Request is a back port of #6525 . It contains the fixes for allowing the RunInfo PopCon jobs to use the dropbox, and not the direct access to Oracle:
- Cleanup of the source handler
- Pass the run number from configuration, not standard input
- Use two connections, both to the target DB for looking at the last IOV, and to a local file for writing the new payload.
title: Fix for RunInfo PopCon tools for 72X
